lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI, India, Feb. 28 (U.P.) -- Royal Air Force fighter planes have made destructive attacks during the past two days on Japanese objectives in a widespread area of Burma, concentrating their main blows against enemy transport, a British communique said today.
abstract: Burma campaign: RAF raids Jap transport lines Mawlu to Ramree Is, Akyab area villages, Rathedaung and Myohaung
